00022 /*-------------------------------------------
00023  * device descriptor 
00024  * ------------------------------------------*/
00025 struct usb_device_descriptor 
00026 {
00027         unsigned char   bLength;
00028         unsigned char   bDescriptorType;
00029         unsigned short  bcdUSB;
00030         unsigned char   bDeviceClass;
00031         unsigned char   bDeviceSubClass;
00032         unsigned char   bDeviceProtocol;
00033         unsigned char   bMaxPacketSize0;
00034         unsigned short  idVendor;
00035         unsigned short  idProduct;
00036         unsigned short  bcdDevice;
00037         unsigned char   iManufacturer;
00038         unsigned char   iProduct;
00039         unsigned char   iSerialNumber;
00040         unsigned char   bNumConfigurations;
00041 };
00042 
00043 /*-------------------------------------------
00044  * configuration descriptor 
00045  * ------------------------------------------*/
00046 
00047 struct usb_configuration_descriptor 
00048 {
00049         unsigned char   bLength;
00050         unsigned char   bDescriptorType;
00051         unsigned short  wTotalLength;
00052         unsigned char   bNumInterfaces;
00053         unsigned char   bConfigurationValue;
00054         unsigned char   iConfiguration;
00055         unsigned char   bmAttributes;
00056         unsigned char   MaxPower;
00057 };
00058 
00059 /*-------------------------------------------
00060  * interface descriptor 
00061  * ------------------------------------------*/
00062 
00063 struct usb_interface_descriptor 
00064 {
00065         unsigned char   bLength;
00066         unsigned char   bDescriptorType;
00067         unsigned char   bInterfaceNumber;
00068         unsigned char   bAlternateSetting;
00069         unsigned char   bNumEndpoints;
00070         unsigned char   bInterfaceClass;
00071         unsigned char   bInterfaceSubClass;
00072         unsigned char   bInterfaceProtocol;
00073         unsigned char   iInterface;
00074 };
00075 
00076 
00077 /*-------------------------------------------
00078  * endpoint descriptor 
00079  * ------------------------------------------*/
00080 struct usb_endpoint_descriptor 
00081 {
00082         unsigned char   bLength;
00083         unsigned char   bDescriptorType;
00084         unsigned char   bEndpointAddress;
00085         unsigned char   bmAttributes;
00086         unsigned short  wMaxPacketSize;
00087         unsigned char   bIntervall;
00088 };
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 /*-------------------------------------------
00093  * string descriptor 
00094  * ------------------------------------------*/
00095 struct usb_string_descriptor 
00096 {
00097         unsigned char   bLength;
00098         unsigned char   bDescriptorType;
00099         unsigned char*  String;
00100 };

00105 /*-------------------------------------------
00106  * USB Device Request
00107  * ------------------------------------------*/
00108 typedef struct usb_device_request_t usb_device_request;
00109 struct usb_device_request_t
00110 {
00111         unsigned char bmRequestType;
00112         unsigned char bRequest;
00113         unsigned short wValue;
00114         unsigned short wIndex;  
00115         unsigned short wLength;
00116 };

00127 /*------------------------------------------
00128  * transfer types 
00129  * ------------------------------------------*/
00130 
00131 #define USB_CTRL                0x00
00132 #define USB_ISOC                0x01
00133 #define USB_BULK                0x02
00134 #define USB_INTR                0x03
00135 
00136 /*-------------------------------------------
00137  * device descriptor types 
00138  * ------------------------------------------*/
00139 #define DO_STANDARD   0x00
00140 #define DO_CLASS      0x20
00141 #define DO_VENDOR     0x40
00142 
00143 /*-------------------------------------------
00144  * standard requests for ep0 
00145  * ------------------------------------------*/
00146 
00147 #define GET_STATUS              0x00 
00148 #define CLR_FEATURE             0x01
00149 #define SET_FEATURE             0x03
00150 #define SET_ADDRESS             0x05
00151 #define GET_DESCRIPTOR          0x06
00152 #define SET_DESCRIPTOR          0x07
00153 #define GET_CONFIGURATION       0x08
00154 #define SET_CONFIGURATION       0x09
00155 #define GET_INTERFACE           0x0A
00156 #define SET_INTERFACE           0x0B
00157 
00158 /*-------------------------------------------
00159  * descriptor types 
00160  * ------------------------------------------*/
00161 
00162 #define DEVICE                  0x01
00163 #define CONFIGURATION           0x02
00164 #define STRING                  0x03
00165 #define INTERFACE               0x04
00166 #define ENDPOINT                0x05
00167 #define DEVICEQUALIFIER         0x06 // only usb2.0
00168 #define OTHERSPEEDCONFIGURATION 0x07 // only usb2.0
00169 
00170 
00171 /*-------------------------------------------
00172  * pid fields 
00173  * ------------------------------------------*/
00174 
00175 #define USB_PID_SOF     0x05
00176 #define USB_PID_SETUP   0x0D
00177 #define USB_PID_IN      0x09
00178 #define USB_PID_OUT     0x01
00179 #define USB_PID_DATA0   0x03
00180 #define USB_PID_DATA1   0x0B
00181 #define USB_PID_ACK     0x02
00182 #define USB_PID_NACK    0x0A
00183 #define USB_PID_STALL   0x0E
00184 #define USB_PID_PRE     0x0C
00185 
00186 
00187 #define MASS_STORAGE_CLASSCODE  0x08
00188 #define HUB_CLASSCODE           0x09
